title: Fireside with the Underboss - In the Witness Protection Program
description: Sammy went into WITSEC in late 1991. In this episode Sammy talks in depth about life in WPP and how he felt living under the suffocating watch of the government.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy went into WITSEC in late 1991. In this episode Sammy talks in depth about life in WPP and how he felt living under the suffocating watch of the government.
itunes:summary: Sammy went into WITSEC in late 1991. In this episode Sammy talks in depth about life in WPP and how he felt living under the suffocating watch of the government.
